name: Gameboy Disc Room
description:
Dodge some discs, have fun, beat your friend's high score. This is a hit, in 1987.

FYI, the downloadable version has a "CRT screen" shader that looks cool. And screen-shake.

CONTROLS:

  • ARROWS/D-PAD to control your disc
  • ENTER/START to retry
  • BACKSPACE/SELECT to reload the cartridge

Made with ❤ in 1 day for GB_Jam.

Follow me: @GabeD3D
